main event: A witness observed a silent object that appeared to be the size of an aircraft moving rapidly in Wheeling, West Virginia on April 4, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 7-10 seconds., The witness could not determine if the object was an actual aircraft or another type of unidentified flying object., The report indicates that there were other possible sightings of military aircraft in the same area., The object moved at a speed estimated to be at least twice that of a normal aircraft., This sighting had only one confirmed witness, but they reported that someone else saw the object too.
witness description: A 23-year-old male who reported the sighting to the County Civil Defense Office.
